Module com.example.pingpong
Package com.example.pingpong.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
com.example.pingpong.Model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Resizable
public class Game extends Object implements Resizable
Represents the entire game state for a Ping-Pong game. This class encapsulates all aspects of the game, including players, ball, game area dimensions, and scoring. It provides methods to manage game flow, such as start, pause, and reset functionalities.

  • Method Details

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets the game to its initial state, including resetting the positions of the ball and the players' rackets, and setting both players' scores to zero. Also, stops the ball's movement and marks the game as paused.

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame()
      Pauses the game, stopping the ball's movement.

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame()
      Resumes the game, allowing the ball to move again.

    • isGamePaused

      public boolean isGamePaused()
      Checks if the game is currently paused.
      Returns:
      True if the game is paused, false otherwise.
